page.title: 03The Market
page.content: Bakewell Market is held every Monday including{Bank Holidays. }In fact the market takes up more space than normal on Bank Holidays. Stalls sell all sorts of things, like vegetables, sweets, meat, toys, clothes, wool, shoes, carpets, pots, ornaments, glasses, jewellry, material and books. It is a noisy place. Stall- holders shout out the prices of the articles they are selling. Sometimes buskers play music and that adds to the noise. Customers chatter away. There's also the noise from the{Cattle {Market,}where sheep, and occasionally pigs and goats are sold as well as cattle. The market starts at about 9am and is over by about 4pm. As you can imagine, it's a very messy and smelly place by the time it's all over.
